https://tmrev.io/movie/290304-21 Years: Richard Linklater 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hlgWdZlnQcA6cpYwdGvFdIHsCaV.jpg A journey through the professional life of innovative film director Richard Linklater: 21 years creating films, carving his signature in pop culture; an analysis of his style and motivations, through the funny and moving testimonies of close friends and collaborators, actors and other filmmakers. 21 Years: Richard Linklater
